docs.name: Vocat API
docs.info: Vocat is a teaching and learning platform that facilitates qualitative and quantitative assessment of a range of media. Built as a collaboration between the Center for Teaching and Learning at Baruch College, City University of New York and Cast Iron Coding of Portland, Oregon, the tool is in active development.
docs.copyright: Copyright 2015 Baruch College, City University of New York

resources.name: Enrollments
resources.full_description: Enrollments are a psuedo-resource that represents a user's membership in a given course. In general, course enrollment can be managed by course evaluators, course assistants, and Vocat administrators. Bulk enrollment is possible using the bulk enrollment endpoint. During bulk enrollment, users who are not currently known to Vocat may be invited via email.

methods.name: index

apis.short_description: returns users enrolled in a given course
returns courses in which a given user is enrolled

methods.full_description: Only admins and evaluator users may see what courses a user is enrolled in. Any user who is enrolled in a course may view which other users are enrolled in that course.

errors.description: The requested course or user does not exist.
The user is not authorized to view enrollments for this course or user.

params.name: role
params.description: Filter enrollments by course role; only available when getting enrollments by course. If this is unset, all enrollments for the course will be returned.
params.validator: Must be one of: evaluator, creator, assistant.

examples:

methods.name: destroy

apis.short_description: removes a user from a course

methods.full_description: Only course evaluators/assistants and Vocat administrators may remove users from courses.

errors.description: Unable to remove the user from the course
Authenticated user is not authorized to mange enrollment for this course.

params.name: enrollment_key
params.description: The enrollment key is a string that takes the format of uXcY where X is the ID of the user to be de-enrolled, and Y is the ID of the course from which to de-enroll the user. If, for example, you wanted to remove User #10 from Course #234, the enrollment key would be u10c234

methods.name: create

apis.short_description: enrolls a single user in a single course

errors.description: Authenticated user is not authorized to mange enrollment for this course.
Unable to add the user to the course, perhaps because the user is already enrolled

params.name: role
params.description: The course role that will be assigned to the user
params.validator: Must be one of: evaluator, assistant, creator.

examples:
Sample Request:

{
    "course": 234,
    "user": 4472,
    "role": "evaluator"
}
Sample Response:

{
    "id": "u4472c235",
    "user": 4472,
    "email": "assistant1@test.com",
    "last_sign_in_at": "never",
    "role": "evaluator",
    "course": 235,
    "user_name": "Gusikowski, Toni",
    "course_name": "[ACCMR] ENG2100: Composition I, Spring 2015",
    "section": "ACCMR"
}

methods.name: bulk

apis.short_description: bulk enrolls multiple users in a course

errors.description: Authenticated user is not authorized to mange enrollment for this course.

params.name: role
params.description: The course role that will be assigned to the user
params.validator: Must be one of: evaluator, assistant, creator.

params.name: invite
params.description: Whether or not to invite users who do not exist in Vocat. If false, users who do not exist will not be invited.
params.validator: Must be one of: true, false.

params.name: contacts
params.description: Each line of the string represents a single user to enroll in the course. Each line can be formatted as “FirstName LastName, Email” or “FirstName LastName <email>”

examples:
Sample Request:

{
    "user": 4472,
    "role": "creator",
    "invite": true,
    "contacts": "Jimbo Baggins, jim@castironcoding.com\nBoomBoom Robinson, boomboom@vocat.io"
}
Sample Response:

[
   {
      "email":"jim@castironcoding.com",
      "first_name":"Jimbo",
      "last_name":"Baggins",
      "action":"invite",
      "success":true,
      "reason":null,
      "message":"Jimbo Baggins has been enrolled in ENG2100: Composition I, Section ACCMR",
      "string":"Jimbo Baggins, jim@castironcoding.com"
   },
   {
      "email":"boomboom@vocat.io",
      "first_name":"BoomBoom",
      "last_name":"Robinson",
      "action":"invite",
      "success":true,
      "reason":null,
      "message":"BoomBoom Robinson has been enrolled in ENG2100: Composition I, Section ACCMR",
      "string":"BoomBoom Robinson, boomboom@vocat.io"
   }
]
